programme.title: Ancient Mysteries
programme.sub-title: Ancient Mysteries: Dead Sea Treasure Map.
programme.desc: In 1952, a team of archaeologists discovered what was to become known as the Copper Scroll in a cave high above the Dead Sea. It was classified as a Dead Sea Scroll, but was not regarded a treasure map rather than a biblical text - and the riches it listed are estimated to be worth $3billion. In this programme, experts travel to Israel, Egypt and Rome, attempting to solve the greatest treasure hunt ever set.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: The doctors treat a series of patients with broken bones and open wounds, including a man involved in a motorcycle accident just three days earlier, and a woman with an abscess on her upper leg and groin. The doctors also deal with Gary, who underwent facial surgery to remove a cancerous tumour from his jaw.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The agents have an explosive run-in with a debtor as they try to retrieve £1,800 owed by a car dealership, and in Derbyshire, two officers try to collect more than £1,500 in unpaid parking fines. Elsewhere, Max and Paul are in London as they attempt to recover £2,000 owed by a property company, but an employee refuses to let them enter.(n)

programme.title: One Night With My Ex
programme.desc: Another three former couples spend 24 hours alone together to discuss their unfinished business. First, ex-fiances' Paul and Phil come together for an emotional reunion, after Paul left the relationship without saying a word. Next to meet up are ex-couple King and Daisy, whose fiery relationship broke down after suspicions of cheating, and Lauren and Blake, who broke up three years ago.(n)

programme.title: Gypsy Kids: Our Secret World
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Romany gypsy Ben has been bullied at school as long as he can remember. Not to be held back, he has dreams of becoming a pilot, and funds his £150 lessons himself by selling eggs to the local cafe. But can he obtain his qualifications with so many interruptions to his education? Four-year-old Rudy watches his dad, professional cage fighter Tony, for the first time, and Irish traveller friends Alivia and Alicia face eviction for the second time this year.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: The stories of four people who have spent a total of almost 90 years on benefits. They include Greater Manchester couple Irene and Steve, who between them have been claiming for 70 years. Irene suffers with agoraphobia, and until recently husband Steve received a care allowance to look after her, but after a recent assessment their money has been cut by £6,000. Plus, a 49-year-old woman who once worked in the benefits office, only for her arthritis to leave her relying on the system, and a 57-year-old Navy veteran who suffers post-traumatic stress disorder after his experiences in the Gulf War.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.sub-title: To the Boy in the Blue Knit Cap.
programme.desc: In the last-ever episode of the long-running crime drama, twins Parker and Thomas Gaffney are found dead in the offices of a successful internet dating website. It emerges they believed the company's owner Danielle Magee had stolen their business idea after they employed her as a programmer and had filed a lawsuit against her. Goren attends his final therapy session and finds his future in the force is in question. Vincent D'Onofrio stars.(n)

programme.title: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces across the nation to discover how CCTV and other technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The first episode focuses on drunkenness and violence, with Nick going to Chester on a race day to find out how the local council and police are using cameras to deal with the 50,000 people descending on the city. In Rotherham, South Yorkshire, operators Martyn and Dave keep in radio contact with nightclub bouncers to prevent trouble at the weekend.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Interior design guru Ann Maurice creates the illusion of space in a 200-year-old cottage in the Cotswold village of Hawkesbury Upton. She also persuades the owner to move her pet ferrets from the yard to an adjacent barn so they do not deter possible buyers.(n)

programme.title: Great Artists
programme.desc: Tim Marlow presents the life and work of the Western world's most gifted artists, beginning with Giotto di Bondone, the son of a Tuscan shepherd. Born in 1267, Giotto began his apprenticeship at the age of 12, and with his naturalistic treatment of medieval Christian iconography, was recognised as the first in a line of great painters and architects who contributed to the Italian Renaissance.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Leah and her genies find themselves trapped inside a cave.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Broken Toy Wash.
programme.desc: Fuse is upset because his new toy wash has been broken and Noddy uses his investigating skills to find out who the culprit is.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: The Patrol have to save Little Hooty's mum when the tree she is in blows over during a storm and is close to falling in the water.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly takes frogspawn home to look after, but is shocked the following morning to discover it has turned into tadpoles.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Fizzy is convinced she has turned Grumpy into a giant.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The piglet tries to prove to Suzy Sheep that she is not a chatterbox.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. It seems that Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Oscar the orang-utan asks Wissper to help him find his favourite umbrella leaf, but his den is so cluttered she decides it needs a thorough clean-up in order to find anything.(n)

programme.title: Toot the Tiny Tugboat
programme.desc: The boat finds a whale who has become trapped by the ice in the sea, so he joins forces with Paula and Pop to shepherd the creature to safety.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: The day's news comes under scrutiny from Matthew Wright and the panel, with viewers and the studio audience invited to share their opinions.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Zareena Hyder meets with a distraught mother-to-be who has just been diagnosed with gestational diabetes, a rare-form which can cause problems with a baby's birth weight. Elsewhere, the doctor's treat a man struggling to cope with Crohn's disease which makes him throw up every time he attempts to swallow his pills, and Dr Muki Sri treats a worried patient who has discovered a lump under his tongue.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Officers come under attack from a gang of violent armed robbers, while Jon and Chris have their work cut out catching up with a dangerous speeder. Plus, the `Big Blue Van' respond to reports of bottles raining down on the streets.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Zac cannot bring himself to confess to Leah and also manages to alienate Sam, while Evelyn has a decision to make after Matt finds the letter offering her a post in Vietnam.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Amy and Leo try to work things out after hitting a bump in their relationship, while Brooke is determined to make amends with the neighbours she scammed.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An internal security breach forces NCIS to go into lockdown when a covert listening device is found in a pen belonging to Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter. DiNozzo discovers that National Security Agency analyst Ellie Bishop wrote a report two years previously predicting the possibility of such an occurrence and she is brought in to assist with the investigation and track down the culprit. Guest starring Leslie Hope and Emily Wickersham.(n)

programme.title: Independence Daysaster
programme.desc: America's fourth of July celebrations are abruptly interrupted when Earth is invaded by hostile aliens. A maverick scientist and a small-town firefighter join forces to find and activate the only piece of technology in the world that can destroy the extraterrestrial army. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Merriman and Tom Everett Scott.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Amy and Leo try to work things out after hitting a bump in their relationship, while Brooke is determined to make amends with the neighbours she scammed.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Zac cannot bring himself to confess to Leah and also manages to alienate Sam, while Evelyn has a decision to make after Matt finds the letter offering her a post in Vietnam.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Claire and Simon seek eviction specialist Chris's help to evict a man claiming to be renting their old family home. Meanwhile, Hamza hopes to get his council flat back after he tried to help a neighbour's friend by letting them stay for a week, but ended up being shut out when they refused to leave. Plus, a man is almost £30k in debt and in danger of repossession after his tenants stopped paying the rent.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Depressed, Stressed and Repossessed.
programme.desc: Stories of people struggling on benefits. Mark from Cheltenham is a part-time drag queen who lost his Spanish bar after a licensing dispute. Now home and claiming sickness benefits for depression, he is keen to get well enough to work again. Plus, the stories of a widowed grandmother whose life has been tough since her drug-addicted grandson was sent to prison for attacking her, and a 63-year-old joiner who cannot work because of back trouble.(n)

programme.title: Rich House, Poor House
programme.desc: Two more families swap places for a week, getting a taste of each other's lives in rural Essex and inner-city London. The Heasemans live in a luxurious farmhouse with six acres of land. The Webbs rent a maisonette in a tower block that is so small, eldest son Marcus is confined to the sofa in the living room. How will both families find their new living arrangements - and the accompanying budgets?.(n)

programme.title: Fritzl: What Happened Next
programme.desc: The case of the Austrian man who kept his daughter prisoner for 24 years in the cellar of his house, until she was released in 2008 at the age of 42. Dramatically pleading guilty to all of the charges at the last moment of the trial, he was sentenced to life in a secure unit for incest, imprisonment, raping the victim - who bore seven children - and causing the death of one child by neglect. This documentary explores the crime itself, Fritzl's trial and the aftermath for everyone involved, and ponders how anyone can possibly recover from such an ordeal.(n)

programme.title: When Kids Kill
programme.sub-title: When Kids Kill: Bullied to Death: Bullied to Death.
programme.desc: Series retelling the stories of some of Britain's most high-profile child killers. The first edition investigates the case of teenagers Hatice Can and Oluwakemi Ajose, who were convicted of the manslaughter of Rosimeiri Boxall in 2009. Presented by Leah Green.(n)

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: Two ageing friends, one a retired composer and the other a filmmaker working on a new project, go on holiday together at a spa resort in the Alps. There, they take stock of their lives and reflect on their artistic accomplishments(n)

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: Combining influences from Tex Avery cartoons to Sam Raimi horror movies to 1940s B-movies, Joel Coen and Ethan Coen followed up the stylish film noir of their debut, Blood Simple (1984), with this frantic screwball comedy. H.I. "Hi" McDonnough (Nicholas Cage) is a philosophical but slightly dim career criminal who has been arrested so often that he gets to know "Ed," short for Edwina (Holly Hunter), the officer who takes his mug shots. Hi takes a shine to Ed and promises to go straight if she marries him. She accepts, and they move to the Arizona desert, where Hi holds down a factory job and blissfully watches the sunsets with Ed. Their serenity is shattered when the couple decides that they want a child and discover that, as Hi puts it, "Ed's womb was a rocky place where my seed could find no purchase." (One of the film's many delights is Hi's unexpectedly flowery dime-novel narration.) Ed goes into a severe depression until she sees an item in the news. Nathan Arizona (Trey Wilson), owner of a chain of unpainted furniture stores, has become the father of quintuplets, and he and his wife joke that they now have more children than they know what to do with. In what seems like a perfect "helps you, helps me" situation, Hi and Ed kidnap one of the Arizona infants, figuring that they'll have a baby and the Arizonas will have less of a burden(n)

programme.title: Civil Brand
programme.desc: Charged, hard-hitting drama follows a new inmate (LisaRaye) as she fights to affect change at a women's penetentiary that is run as a prison-for-profit by abusive, corrupt officials. Hip-hop star Mos Def costars as a sympathetic jailer who tries to help the exploited yardbirds. Rappers Da Brat and MC Lyte are also featured. N'Bushe Wright, Monica Calhoun, Clifton Powell, Lark Voohies(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: A portrait of an irreverent Armed Forces Radio deejay in Saigon during the Vietnam War(n)

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: A workaholic chef deals with taking charge of her orphaned 9-year-old niece and a free-spirited co-worker in this romantic comedy that is a remake of the 2001 German movie "Mostly Martha"(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: Ron Howard helms this adaptation of Nathaniel Philbrick's historical novel about the harrowing high-seas encounter that inspired Herman Melville's Moby Dick. In the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship the Essex struggle to survive after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days. Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy, Ben Whishaw, and Brendan Gleeson co-star(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Joel Schumacher's psychological thriller with Colin Farrell trapped in a phone booth and targeted by a sniper(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman find love in the Outback in Baz Luhrmann's sweeping(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Bob and Walt Tenor are conjoined twins. All is good for them until Walt's dreams of stardom on the big screen and Bob's shyness begin to clash(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010. Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Political drama based on real-life events about a Texas congressman whose intervention in Afghanistan, supplying weapons and other equipment to rebel troops fighting against the Soviet Union, has far-reaching and unforeseen consequences(n)

programme.title: Hamlet 2
programme.desc: Comedy about a failed actor turned drama teacher who, in a final and deluded attempt to make an impact, sets about creating a controversial and 'inspirational' sequel to William Shakespeare's Hamlet(n)

programme.title: Thirteen Conversations About One Thing
programme.desc: A superb ensemble cast---including Matthew McConaughey, John Turturro, Alan Arkin and Amy Irving---is featured in this penetrating drama about several unfulfilled New Yorkers whose lives intersect. The perceptive, intricately plotted script explores the different ways people search for happiness. David Connelly, Clea DuVall(n)

programme.title: The Enforcer
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood resumes his role as uncompromising detective, 'Dirty' Harry Callahan in this third instalment of the Dirty Harry series. This time Callahan wages war on a terrorist group and his 'by the book' superiors(n)

programme.title: I Spy
programme.desc: CIA agent Alex Scott is teamed with an unlikely partner for a secret mission in Budapest to recover a superplane: loud-mouthed boxing champ Kelly Robinson. Spy comedy(n)

programme.title: The Crew
programme.desc: As they await eviction from a Miami hotel, four retired mobsters try to scare off the other residents by making them an offer they can't refuse. Burt Reynolds, Richard Dreyfuss. Donatelli: Dan Hedaya. Donato: Seymour Cassel. Det. Neal: Carrie-Anne Moss. Ferris: Jennifer Tilly. Directed by Michael Dinner(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson plays former cop John Shaft, the nephew of the '70s private eye of the same name, who takes on a racist killer and a Dominican drug lord. Slick but unfocused. Christian Bale. Richard Roundtree, the star of the 1971 original and two sequels, has a cameo. Other cameos include Gordon Parks, who directed the original film; and Isaac Hayes, who wrote the memorable theme song(n)

programme.title: The Rocker
programme.desc: The Office star Rainn Wilson portrays a drummer named "Fish," who gets a second shot at fame 20 years after getting kicked out of his band on the very night they signed the record contract that made them stars. Fish has spent the past two decades languishing at soul-crushing day jobs while his old bandmates became legends, continuing to grace magazine covers and dominate the radio. He might just get another chance at musical success, however, when his teenage cousin invites him to drum for his high school garage band, and they end up catching the ear of record executives. Now, Fish is determined to live the hedonistic rock & roll lifestyle he missed out on 20 years ago, but his new bandmates don't appreciate his hard partying -- and neither do his middle-aged knees. This Fox Atomic comedy co-stars Christina Applegate. Shawn Levy (Night at the Museum) and Tom McNulty co-produced the feature, which was penned by Wallace Wolodarsky and Maya Forbes, and directed by Peter Cattaneo (Opal Dream)(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their maze trials after narrowly escaping the first test in this young-adult dystopian sequel(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: A cop in hi-tech "pre-crime" unit in 2054 goes on the run after being labeled as a future killer. In order to prove his innocence, he kidnaps one of the psychics who predicts the imminent crimes while eluding a determined G-man(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Writer-director Paul WS Anderson tunes-up Roger Corman's 1975 cult vehicle "Death Race 2000" in this action flick about a contest pitting a convict against other convicts, with the winner walking off with his freedom(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: This utterly chilling horror film centers on a young woman who must protect her brother from a terrifying apparition that only manifests in total darkness. Later, she realizes that this fearsome entity is connected to her mentally ill mother, who has started hallucinating conversations with a mysterious figure named Diana(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: In the nerve-shredding third installment of this horror series about a night when all crime is legal, an ex-cop who refused to murder his son's killer must now act as the head of security for a presidential candidate who wants to end "the Purge."(n)

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: Hit man Arthur Bishop is forced to commit three difficult assassinations in order to rescue his kidnapped lover(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Explorer Rick O¿Connell (Brendan Frasier) and his wife Evelyn (Maria Bello) are now retired. But they are also quite bored, so when they are invited by the British government to take a precious gem to China they don¿t think twice. The ancient stone is capable of resurrecting the Emperor Han and of pointing the way to Shangri-La. When the couple reaches China, they meet their son Alex, who has discovered the tomb of Han, and Evelyn's brother Jonathan Carnahan. Centuries ago, the evil Emperor Han was cursed by the sorceress Zi Yuan who transformed him and his army into mummies. When the explorers are betrayed by a friend, the mummy is awoken from a 2,000-year-old curse and now threatens to plunge the world into his merciless, unending service(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: This mockumentary satire of the music business and modern celebrity centers on self-absorbed pop rapper Conner4Real (Andy Samberg). Once a member of a popular rap trio called the Style Boyz, Conner is now a solo artist about to drop his second album. Unfortunately, the release gets abysmal reviews, and his career begins to melt down when his attempts at rehabing his image lead to such disasters as a global blackout and a proposal to his girlfriend interrupted by a wolf attack. Eventually, Conner considers burying the hatchet with former colleagues Owen (Jorma Taccone) and Lawrence (Akiva Schaffer) in order to reunite the Style Boyz. Tim Meadows, Maya Rudolph, Sarah Silverman, and Imogen Poots co-star. Samberg, Taccone, and Schaffer co-wrote the screenplay, while Taccone and Schaffer shared directing duties(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy(n)

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: Two ageing friends, one a retired composer and the other a filmmaker working on a new project, go on holiday together at a spa resort in the Alps. There, they take stock of their lives and reflect on their artistic accomplishments(n)

programme.sub-title: Your Moment of Them: The Best of Ronny Chieng
programme.desc: Your Moment of Them: The Best of Ronny Chieng. A look at correspondent Ronny Chieng's best work includes reports on racism, an interfaith initiative and Donald Trump's China policy(n)

programme.title: @midnight With Chris Hardwick
programme.sub-title: Mary Lynn Rajskub; Al Jackson; \"Weird Al\" Yankovic
programme.desc: Mary Lynn Rajskub; Al Jackson; "Weird Al" Yankovic. Mary Lynn Rajskub, Al Jackson and "Weird Al" Yankovic are the panelists(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Rainforest Schmainforest. In the Season 3 premiere, the boys accompany a teacher (voice of Jennifer Aniston) and her singing-and-dancing group to Central America to raise awareness of the rain forest. Also: Kenny falls for a choir member; and Kyle has trouble mastering the choreography(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Hooked on Monkey Phonics. The home-schooling trend is pointedly satirized in this typically irreverent episode of South Park. Rebecca and Mark, a pair of home-schooled children, win the South Park spelling bee. As a result, they want to attend public school, and Eric's mom buys him a "Hooked on Phonics Monkey" (who is eventually responsible for Kenny's demise). Kyle falls in love with Rebecca, a romance that surprisingly helps Mark gain acceptance. "Hooked on Phonics Monkey" first aired November 10, 1999, on Comedy Central(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Spontaneous Combustion. The citizens of South Park are randomly exploding and it's up to Stan Marsh to find the cause. Meanwhile, Kyle discovers his dad is having problems with erectile dysfunction(n)

programme.desc: Episode 1.3. Skits include a takeoff on a home-shopping network and outtakes from the mini-series(n)

programme.desc: Somebody to Love. Hyde discovers that Leo has almost put the record store out of business in his absence, and Jackie humiliates herself during a night out on the town(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: You're My Best Friend. A surprise bachelor party for Hyde falls apart when the guest of honour lands in jail, while his wife gets to know his ex-girlfriend a little better(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Misfire. Bruce Willis plays an employer interviewing Kelso, who uses the Formans' 25th-anniversary party to make a proposal(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Stone Cold Crazy. Samantha uses her work experience to help both Donna and Kitty liven up their relationships. Fez is disappointed when his fantasy about having a roommate does not match up with reality(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Long Away. Red hires Leo to take pictures at his veterans reunion; Jackie and Fez suspect Donna is cheating on Eric. Young Leo: Cody Nickell(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show

programme.desc: Chinpokomon. Trey Parker and Matt Stone aim their harsh satiric eye at the Pokemon craze in this episode of South Park. Eric, Stan, Kenny, Kyle, and the rest of the children of the town are falling all over themselves in an attempt to get the newest Chinpokomon toys. Slowly, the kids begin speaking a foreign language. An investigation uncovers that Chinpokomon is being used to brainwash kids into Anti-American actions. This typically irreverent episode of South Park references Independence Day and gets big laughs from a very old (and politically incorrect) gag concerning the physical size of various nationalities. "Chinpokomon" first aired November 3, 1999, on Comedy Central(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted is delighted with a woman he is seeing, until he introduces her to his friends, who reveal she has an irritating habit - which then becomes the only thing he notices about her. Infuriated, he decides to get even by pointing out the things he finds annoying about them. Meanwhile, Marshall anxiously awaits the results of his bar exam.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily frets about her first Thanksgiving as a married woman, Ted sleeps with Robin after an argument, before realising they have nothing to talk about, and Barney worries about Marshall administering his slaps.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta enlists Jeffords to help him tackle a cold case that everyone thinks is unsolvable. Meanwhile, Santiago plans a romantic weekend away with her new boyfriend Teddy, and Gina and Diaz tell Boyle one of their best-kept secrets. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Melissa Fumero.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta suspects a civic leader of money laundering, but his investigation is shut down by the police commissioner. Determined to crack the case, he enlists Santiago and Holt to help uncover more evidence - and risks suspension as a result. Boyle is devastated when Vivian ends their relationship, so his colleagues try to cheer him up.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Adam picks a team of popular athletes over his own friends in gym class, his mates seek revenge by forcing their opponents to play a game of Dungeons and Dragons. Murray objects when Erica decides that she wants to go away from home to attend college. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Barry insists that Beverly always favours Adam, she tries to make amends by smothering her oldest son with affection, much to his horror. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon decides to put his formidable brain power to use in devising a scientific procedure for making friends. However, to prove his findings he must first win the trust of fellow scientist Barry Kripke to gain access to a powerful computer. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and John Ross Bowie.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny runs into money troubles, so Sheldon offers to lend her some cash to help her pay the rent. However, when Leonard discovers his neighbour's ex-boyfriend Kurt is the cause of her financial woes, he gathers the gang for a confrontation. Starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes is put in an awkward position when Freddie turns up with Lexi and asks her to take her. Meanwhile, Neeta and Sally plan to move, but Neeta has some skeletons in her closet, and Marnie steps up her revenge plan.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam risks bodily harm during an intense game of paintball to impress his latest crush, and Erica pretends she has a college-aged boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends offer a place for Raj to live, only for it to create unexpected conflict among everyone and an argument between Amy and Leonard's mother.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny begins to get along so well with new housemate Raj that Leonard starts to feel left out. Sheldon expresses an interest in Amy's work.(n)

programme.title: Gap Year
programme.desc: Dylan is taken to a Buddhist monastery after a surprise meeting with Sam, the vengeful travel writer he impersonated in Vietnam. Janeane Garofalo guest stars. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: With his parents recently divorced, privately educated Will has to move to a new area and make friends at the local comprehensive, where he meets Simon, Jay and Neil. First-ever episode of the comedy, starring Simon Bird, Joe Thomas, James Buckley and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: The four lads decide to play truant from sixth form and buy alcohol for an all-day drinking session, which is interrupted when Neil's father comes home early. Meanwhile, Simon decides to declare his love for Carli through graffiti, and the friends face the wrath of their parents.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard's purchase of a dining-room table causes Sheldon to re-evaluate his life. Meanwhile, Howard is offered the chance to go back to the International Space Station, and Bernadette struggles to decide whether to encourage him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Melissa Rauch.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After arguing with Sheldon, Howard tries to make amends by taking him to Nasa's headquarters in Houston. Elsewhere, Penny has second thoughts about quitting her job as a waitress when her car dies, while Amy tries to find Raj a date. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Trek: Spy on the Wildebeest
programme.desc: The first of a two-part documentary about Africa's great wildebeest migration, during which more than one million animals make the arduous 3,000km round trip across Tanzania's Serengeti and Kenya's Masai Mara. Remote spycams follow a calf as it tries to evade lions, cheetahs, hyenas and crocodiles, and faces some of nature's most gruelling physical challenges during the year-long journey.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Observations of the sky over a 24-hour period, featuring thunderstorms, rainbows, sunset, temperature inversion and auroras at the poles.(n)

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Dallas Campbell and Ellie Harrison present the first of two programmes in which they embark on the ultimate treasure hunt, searching the globe to uncover its extraordinary riches, from natural gems to precious metals - and more besides. Dallas begins his search Down Under, free-diving for lustrous pearls in the waters around north-west Australia and seeking out diamonds from the bottom of the ocean. He also learns about opal mining in one of the most hostile places on Earth and, together with Ellie, reveals how ambergris, a substance that starts life in a sperm whale's stomach, can prove an expensive ingredient in perfume. Plus, how one of the largest and most unusual treasures has helped solve a 67-million-year-old puzzle.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: Documentary shot over the course of two years, providing an insight into work at Chengdu Research Base in central China. The programme details how workers at the sanctuary hope to breed 300 pandas as part of an ambitious conservation project, the final aim being to introduce them back into the wild and help bring the creatures back from the brink of extinction. Narrated by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Trek: Spy on the Wildebeest
programme.desc: The first of a two-part documentary about Africa's great wildebeest migration, during which more than one million animals make the arduous 3,000km round trip across Tanzania's Serengeti and Kenya's Masai Mara. Remote spycams follow a calf as it tries to evade lions, cheetahs, hyenas and crocodiles, and faces some of nature's most gruelling physical challenges during the year-long journey.(n)

programme.title: Life on Earth: A New Prehistory
programme.desc: The natural history series continues, investigating how the fossils of feathered dinosaurs discovered in China overturned accepted theories about the origins of birds.(n)

Dallas begins his search Down Under, free-diving for lustrous pearls in the waters around north-west Australia and seeking out diamonds from the bottom of the ocean. He also learns about opal mining in one of the most hostile places on Earth and, together with Ellie, reveals how ambergris, a substance that starts life in a sperm whale's stomach, can prove an expensive ingredient in perfume. Plus, how one of the largest and most unusual treasures has helped solve a 67-million-year-old puzzle.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Observations of the sky over a 24-hour period, featuring thunderstorms, rainbows, sunset, temperature inversion and auroras at the poles.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: Documentary shot over the course of two years, providing an insight into work at Chengdu Research Base in central China. The programme details how workers at the sanctuary hope to breed 300 pandas as part of an ambitious conservation project, the final aim being to introduce them back into the wild and help bring the creatures back from the brink of extinction. Narrated by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age Giants
programme.desc: Alice Roberts explains what the remains of mammals reveal about how they fared in cold climates. In Transylvanian caves, she discovers evidence of a conflict between a cave bear and a lion, both of which became victims of a deep freeze that swept across Europe, while in Siberia she finds that the well-preserved remains of a female woolly rhinoceros demonstrate it was perfectly evolved to face the bitter conditions in Yakutsk - the coldest city on Earth. Alice also travels to a Jersey cave, where archaeological findings shed light on how Ice Age human beings and Neanderthals fashioned stone tools to hunt mammoths.(n)

programme.title: Trek: Spy on the Wildebeest
programme.desc: The first of a two-part documentary about Africa's great wildebeest migration, during which more than one million animals make the arduous 3,000km round trip across Tanzania's Serengeti and Kenya's Masai Mara. Remote spycams follow a calf as it tries to evade lions, cheetahs, hyenas and crocodiles, and faces some of nature's most gruelling physical challenges during the year-long journey.(n)

programme.title: Life on Earth: A New Prehistory
programme.desc: The natural history series continues, investigating how the fossils of feathered dinosaurs discovered in China overturned accepted theories about the origins of birds.(n)

programme.desc: Conclusion. The migration reaches Kenya's Masai Mara, where the river presents the strongest challenge yet for the calves. Cameras reveal how crocodiles and hippos are preying on stragglers, while the rough waters threaten to sweep the animals away.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: A look at sinkholes and the dangers they pose to people, animals and property.(n)

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: The second of two programme focuses on man-made treasures. Dallas Campbell dives to a shipwreck where 5,000 emeralds have been found, hunts for a treasure chest hidden in the Rocky Mountains and comes face to face with China's Terracotta Army. Ellie Harrison enters a jewelled room in Russia decorated with millions of pounds' worth of amber, meets diamond-cutters who know a single slip of the hand could be costly and travels to Egypt, where she stares at Tutankhamun's death mask, one of the most famous golden images on the planet.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.sub-title: Meerkats: Secrets of an Animal Superstar.
programme.desc: Meerkat pups Squirt and Weeny belong to one of the most famous animal families on the planet and are also part of a 20-year animal behaviour study. David Attenborough narrates the full story of the research, from the early days when it was a challenge to even get close to a meerkat to the latest revelations about these animals and their complex lives.(n)

Suspicion and doubt poison the court, turning friends into enemies and family into murderers(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Peter La Fleur owns Average Joe's Gym, a scruffy establishment with a loyal clientele, while across the street Globo Gym, owned by White Goodman, is all glass and chrome and full of toned muscle. When Peter learns that he must pay the bank $50,000 in 30 days, White is overjoyed: now he can have the parking lot his gym's always needed. But Peter decides to set up a money-earning dodgeball tournament (a sport that consists of not being hit by the opposing team's balls) to earn the dough and it is, of course, his team of misfits against White's tough pros in the final. Rawson Marshall Thurber's debut feature is a mix of verbal and physical humour and if the outcome is never in doubt, both Vaughn and particularly Stiller throw themselves into the film with enjoyable gusto(n)

programme.desc: A teenager learns that the older woman he had a torrid affair with is his roommate's mother(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: CGI-filled adventure based on Katherine Paterson's classic children's novel about two teenage friends who escape to a magical woodland which helps them deal with the highs and lows of their real life. Free-spirited girl Leslie befriends an unhappy boy called Jess at her new school. Together, they visit Terabithia, an escapist world created in Leslie's mind, and featuring fairytale creatures based on their playground friends and foes(n)

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Cynical screenwriter takes a teaching job just to pay the bills, but gains a new perspective when he falls for mature student(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Ricki is an aging rock-n'roll-loving woman who abandoned her family in order to chase her tattered dream of becoming a famous rock star. Now, she is given one last chance to set things right when her ex-husband, Pete, asks her to visit her estranged daughter, Julie, in Chicago(n)

programme.title: Cadillac Records
programme.desc: In 1940s Chicago, Polish immigrant Leonard Chess sets up a record label, bringing a string of talented black artists into the mainstream. With acts such as Chuck Berry and Etta James on his books, the money begins to roll in, but as their success grows, trouble brews behind the scenes(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Michael Shaara, For Love of the Game brought Kevin Costner back to the world of baseball after his successes with Bull Durham (1988) and Field of Dreams (1989). Billy Chapel (Kevin Costner) is a star pitcher with the Detroit Tigers, standing on the mound at Yankee Stadium and throwing what is shaping up to be a perfect game with the help of his best friend and catcher, Gus Osinski (John C. Reilly). However, Billy is having a hard time keeping his mind on the game; he's come to a crossroads in both his personal and professional lives, and he isn't sure what to do or where to go. He's learned that the Tigers are about to be sold, and the new owners intend to trade him at the end of the season, and that his girlfriend Jane (Kelly Preston) is planning to leave him. For Love of the Game represents a change of pace for director Sam Raimi, best-known for the Evil Dead trilogy and the acclaimed suspense drama A Simple Plan (1998) (although Raimi, a baseball fan born in Michigan, doubtless enjoyed making a film featuring the Detroit Tigers)(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: A single, child psychologist breaks up with his live-in girlfriend when he learns that she is pregnant(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: The Princess in the Tower. The future of the princes in the Tower is in Richard's hands: they are a threat to his reign but also to Margaret's hopes of seeing her son Henry Tudor on the throne. As Margaret plots the boys' removal, Anne is tormented by fears she has unwittingly sealed the princes' fate. Elizabeth, in sanctuary, is horrified to realise she has made a pact with her enemies and turns to witchcraft to punish the guilty(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Peter La Fleur owns Average Joe's Gym, a scruffy establishment with a loyal clientele, while across the street Globo Gym, owned by White Goodman, is all glass and chrome and full of toned muscle. programme.title: White Noise 2: The Light
programme.desc: A man (Nathan Fillion) who watched the murder of his wife and child and had his own near-death experience develops the ability to identify people who are about to die and tempts fate when he tries to intervene. A pulse-pounder that never lets up until the frightening climactic scene. Katee Sackhoff, Craig Fairbrass, Adrian Holmes, Kendall Cross, William MacDonald. Directed by Patrick Lussier(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: The Battle of Bel Air. This episode introduces Marla Heasley in the role of Tawnia Baker, an intrepid reporter who becomes an unofficial member of the A-Team (it is explained that Tawnia's predecessor Amy Allen is "on assignment" overseas). Working undercover to expose a crooked security firm, Marla is kidnapped when she tumbles onto the firm's scheme to assassinate foreign dignitary Shiek Fatasi (Edward Ansara). Figuring they owe Marla a favor after she helped them escape the clutches of Col. Dexter (Lance LeGault), the A-Team races to her rescue. Future That 70s Show regular Kurtwood Smith is seen as a villain named Carson(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Medieval fantasy meets futuristic science fiction in this effects-heavy action epic from former X-Files director Rob Bowman. In present-day London, 12-year-old Quinn Abercromby witnesses the awakening of a hibernating dragon from a centuries-long slumber, the result of a construction dig supervised by his mother and an incident for which Quinn feels partially responsible. Twenty years later, the adult Quinn (Christian Bale) is the fire chief of a refortified castle community, responsible for dousing the blazes lit by the dragon's prodigious number of flame-spewing offspring, airborne juggernauts that have wreaked havoc across the globe, torching civilization and turning humans into an endangered species. Hope arrives in the form of Denton "Dragon Slayer" Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey), an American known to be the only man to ever kill one of the dragons, and Alex (Izabella Scorupco), a scientist/pilot who's a member of Van Zan's army, a zealous fighting force that includes a secret weapon: the Archangels, paratroopers using themselves as bait to attract and then dispatch the deadly beasts. Reign of Fire (2002) co-stars Gerard Butler, Alice Krige, and Alexander Siddig(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Michael gets himself arrested to help the FBI take down a vicious Boston mobster, on the basis that they will reciprocate by furnishing him with more information about the government's investigation into Nate's murder. Meanwhile, Jesse and Pearce run into trouble while investigating a gun sale.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Part one of two. Brenda takes involuntary leave, but ends up assisting an investigation into a murder linked to a terrorist group, while Commander Taylor takes advantage of her enforced layoff to try to break up the PHD. Crime drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Part two of two. Brenda discovers she has been given false information while attempting to find a terrorist-linked suspect. She is forced to untangle a web of deceit to determine who she can trust and prevent the PHD becoming the victims of a sinister plan.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate the contract killing of a businessman's wife. Evidence at the scene points to two assailants, one of whom was wearing a bandage, and the victim's mother-in-law becomes the chief suspect. Starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A man admits to killing his father and half-brother, but Goren and Eames discover he had been heavily influenced by a self-improvement guru. The detectives are forced to take an unorthodox approach to discover whether the chief suspect was coerced into carrying out the murders.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An internal security breach forces NCIS to go into lockdown when a covert listening device is found in a pen belonging to Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter. DiNozzo discovers that National Security Agency analyst Ellie Bishop wrote a report two years previously predicting the possibility of such an occurrence and she is brought in to assist with the investigation and track down the culprit. Guest starring Leslie Hope and Emily Wickersham.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when marine corporal Flegman is found shot to death, and a phone leads them to a hotel room where Gibbs awkwardly stumbles upon his ex-wife Diane Sterling and her FBI agent ex-husband TC Fornell. She had been attempting to call her boyfriend Eddie to break up with him, but somehow Flegman had taken possession of his phone. The team tracks down Eddie's car and discovers a clown nose along with traces of blood and he quickly becomes the prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A teenager becomes the prime suspect in the murder of his family, and Brenda tries to resist the imposition of budget cuts at LAPD. Detective drama starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda puts a priest under investigation in connection with the death of a gang member, but learns he has an unexpected defender - Sergeant Gabriel. Back at home, she has to deal with her father, who knows that she and Fritz are living together.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A troubled airport baggage supervisor is found murdered, prompting Goren and Eames to interrogate her colleagues about their reasons for distrusting her. The policemen finally uncover evidence of an operation that could well have been enough reason to silence the victim. Detective drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate when the owner of one of the city's most exclusive hotels is found dead from a fatal injection of Botox, and suspicion falls on her unstable daughter, who resented her mother's interference in her love life. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigate when a mysterious, fast-spreading illness strikes children from military families. While Gibbs investigates the cause, Abby and Jimmy partner with the Naval Medical Research Centre in the hope of delivering a cure before the holidays. Mark Harmon stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is killed by a stolen surveillance drone and the team links it to elusive terrorist Benham Parsa. NCIS joins forces with the Department of Defence to track down the device before it is used for a large-scale attack, but Gibbs is less than pleased that he has to work with his ex-lover Hollis Mann. Meanwhile, McGee hopes he will be granted time off to attend a black-tie gala honouring his girlfriend Delilah. Guest starring Susanna Thompson (Arrow).(n)

programme.title: 24: Legacy
programme.desc: A major threat forces CTU to go on lockdown. Meanwhile, Carter finds himself in a tense situation, and Donovan reaches out to Rebecca when he faces a big decision in his campaign.(n)

programme.title: Prison Break
programme.desc: New series. The US crime thriller returns, picking up with Lincoln years later as he uncovers evidence that suggests his deceased brother Michael may actually be alive.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Griffin kids complain that their parents enjoy easy lives, so Peter and Lois challenge them to swap places. Things appear to be going well for a while, with Chris working at the brewery and Meg taking her mother's place as home-maker, but the youngsters soon begin to buckle under the pressure of adulthood.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian and Quagmire compete for the affections of each other's old flames, and Peter is furious with the local dry cleaner for losing his favourite white shirt. With the voices of Cheryl Tiegs and Drew Barrymore.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is rude to an old man in a wheelchair, who retaliates by casting a spell that makes him age rapidly. Vowing to redeem himself, the CIA agent determines to climb Kilimanjaro to reverse the curse put on him. With the voice of Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is horrified when Steve's friend Barry comes close to beating his high-school wrestling record, and enlists Roger's help to defeat him. However, his plan proves to be badly flawed when Roger threatens to claim the record instead.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg is thrilled to make a new friend, unaware she is a member of a suicide cult. Peter inadvertently cancels Lois's plans for Stewie's first birthday party and has to go to great lengths to make alternative arrangements.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter is placed under house arrest and fills his time by turning the basement into a bar - where Lois finds fame as the resident singer. Meanwhile, Stewie tries to build a time machine in a bid to avoid teething pain. Animated comedy, with the voices of Alex Borstein and Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Fr Donovan organises a Christmas play at the shopping centre, and casts Stan as Santa Claus and Roger as Jesus - but they land themselves in trouble after getting into a fight with each other. Elsewhere, Hayley and Jeff adopt a child, who turns out to be possessed.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve tries to prove his toughness to Stan by adopting the persona of a superhero, while Francine also goes through an identity crisis when she receives news that could change the family for ever.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Chris wants to start a new hobby and befriends a puppeteer named Franz, an old friend of Herbert's. Despite hearing warnings about the entertainer's past, the duo remain friends until Franz's dark history is revealed.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: The Hand That Rocks the Wheelchair.
programme.desc: Meg offers to look after Joe while Bonnie is out of town, but her enthusiasm for the task begins to grow increasingly disturbing. Elsewhere, Stewie worries his reputation as the toughest baby around is beginning to slip, and hooks himself up to a machine he hopes will increase his evil urges. Comedy, featuring the voices of Mila Kunis and Patrick Warburton.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan finally saves enough money to join the golf club he has worked at for the past 30 summers - only to discover Steve has been given a membership before him. However, everything changes when the CIA officer learns who owns the business. Featuring the voice of Hulk Hogan.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: Wheels and the Legman and the Case of Grandpa's Key.
programme.desc: Stan joins Roger and Steve's fictional detective agency, but proves to be surprisingly incompetent at his imaginary job. An infuriated Roger orders Steve to fire him - but the youngster cannot bring himself to do it. Animated comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Michael and the team trace the gun that was used to kill Nate, finding that the crime was perpetrated by a mercenary group. To find out which individuals are responsible, the investigator poses as a wealthy executive looking to hire a private army, but Sam and Jesse have to step in to help when he gets roped into a CIA mission involving the agency's newest asset, Fiona.(n)

programme.desc: A teenager becomes the prime suspect in the murder of his family, and Brenda tries to resist the imposition of budget cuts at LAPD. Detective drama starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.desc: A petty officer is killed by a stolen surveillance drone and the team links it to elusive terrorist Benham Parsa. programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Flynn and Provenza attend the funeral of a former police colleague, but events take a surprising turn when the contents of the coffin are revealed. Meanwhile, Brenda and Fritz's house-hunting gains momentum. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and the team face a race against time to find a missing eight-year-old girl who disappeared on her way home from school, and Gabriel puts his career in jeopardy when he takes drastic action to solve the case.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A psychiatrist is found murdered, leading Goren and Eames to suspect an ophthalmologist may be involved, especially when they realise that his research into schizophrenia could be masking mental health problems of his own. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate the seemingly random murders of several homeless people, uncovering a fraud involving a crooked insurance agent. But when he is found dead, with no sign of the stolen money, the detectives must call on all their experience to catch the killer. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan, with Lance Reddick (The Wire).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In an effort to find the terrorist Parsa, Gibbs and the NCIS team track down one of his cohorts using evidence gleaned from the drone attack which has killed six people and wounded a further 22. Meanwhile, an emotionally shaken McGee struggles with the ramifications of the incident. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, Sean Murray, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The murder of a port authority officer reveals Parsa's possible whereabouts as the team continues the hunt for the terrorist intent on wiping out NCIS. Bishop reveals her past association with the quarry and suggests where she thinks he may be found, but the CIA has intercepted a call that places Parsa in a different location to Ellie's hunch. Mark Harmon and Emily Wickersham star.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Hayley decides to dye her hair blonde in a bid to get more attention, while Stan and Steve try to find a new home for the family. Animated comedy about a man who works for the CIA, voiced by Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie becomes addicted to ADHD medication, while Peter and Quagmire start their own cookery shows.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine's attraction to Stan wanes after he becomes addicted to slot-car racing, and Roger becomes an air-stewardess in an attempt to secure an audience for his comedy routines.(n)

programme.desc: Mayor West marries Lois's sister and the pair move into the Griffin family home, where he becomes Peter's best friend. However, not everyone welcomes the new arrivals, and Stewie takes over Chris's room after being evicted from his own.(n)

In the devastating aftermath of the fight for humanity, an enigmatic group strives to alter the course of history as an ancient force of evil plots the destruction of mankind. In order to defeat it, Optimus Prime (voice of Peter Cullen) and the rest of the Autobots must join forces with a new, resilient band of humans who will fight an epic battle that will determine the fate of the entire human race. programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: A motor-mouthed high-school security guard joins his prospective brother-in-law, a decorated police detective, on a shift along the mean streets of Atlanta and learns that life on the force is no picnic in this action comedy from director Tim Story (Fantastic Four, Think Like a Man). Ben (Kevin Hart) longs to marry his gorgeous girlfriend Angela (Tika Sumpter), but before he can propose he must first get the approval of her tough-as-nails brother James (Ice Cube), a top detective in the Atlanta Police Department. When aspiring police officer Ben gets accepted into the academy, he finally musters the courage to ask for James' blessings. Still unconvinced that Ben has what it takes to provide for his beloved baby sister, James invites Ben on a ride-along through the toughest parts of town. At first James' efforts to terrify the young trainee go perfectly according to plan, but once the pair incur the wrath of Atlanta's most feared criminal, all bets are off. John Leguizamo and Laurence Fishburne co-star(n)

It all begins when Frodo receives a ring from his uncle Bilbo (Ian Holm) and wizard Gandalf (Ian McKellen) discovers it is the Unique Ring itself. This powerful ring has been conceived by Sauron, the dark Lord of Mordor (Sala Baker), and with it, it is possible to enslave the whole of the Middle-earth through the use of dark forces. To destroy the ring, Frodo must take it to a distant mountain in Mordor, a region controlled by the Master of Evil. Fortunately, he is accompanied by a group formed by Hobbits Sam (Sean Astin), Merry (Dominic Monaghan) and Pippin (Billy Boyd), as well as Gandalf, the human warriors Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen) and Boromir (Sean Bean), and elf Legolas (Orlando Bloom). programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge Gets a Job. The Simpson family's home is in sad shape -- the house has slipped from its foundation, and has begun sliding on an angle into the ground. Surly Joe, proprietor of the only foundation-repair firm in town, tells Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta) and Marge (voice of Julie Kavner) that it will cost 8,500 dollars to set the house right. This is more than the family budget can handle at the moment, so Marge decides to look for a job. After Lisa (voice of Yeardley Smith) encourages Marge to beef up her resumé with a creative approach to the facts, she lands a job at the Springfield Nuclear Power Plant, where Homer works. It isn't long before C. Montgomery Burns (voice of Harry Shearer), the ancient and ill-tempered owner of the plant, develops a powerful infatuation with Marge, and he's willing to do whatever he must to win her heart away from her husband, including a candlelight dinner with music from Marge's favorite singer, Tom Jones (performing his own voice), who has been specially kidnapped for the occasion. Meanwhile, Bart (voice of Nancy Cartwright) discovers his habit of telling tall tales is catching up with him when he finds himself trailed by an escaped wolf -- but given his history of spinning whoppers, no one believes him. "Marge Gets a Job."(n)

To compensate them, he allows the mob to film an adult movie in his home - but keeps Marge in the dark about his plans. When Marge finds out, she goes ballistic, leaving Homer to look after the children while she goes on a trek to the beach. While by the sea, she meets Caleb Thorn (voiced by Alec Baldwin), a handsome marine biologist who has dedicated his life to saving manatees. Will Marge be wooed by Caleb? And can Homer win Marge back?(n)

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: The plucky talking mouse feels left out when the son of his adopted human family makes a new pal - but quickly forgets such trifling matters when his high-flying canary friend is captured by an evil falcon, prompting the brave rodent to mount a daring rescue. Family adventure sequel, with Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie and Jonathan Lipnicki, and the voices of Michael J Fox, Melanie Griffith and James Woods.(n)

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: A Chinese secret agent falls in love with a single mother while helping the CIA apprehend a terrorist, and decides to quit the espionage business. He offers to look after her three kids for the weekend, but struggles to cope with their mischief-making - and to make matters worse, the terrorist escapes from prison. Comedy, with Jackie Chan and Magnus Scheving.(n)

programme.title: Big Business
programme.desc: The first-born babies in two sets of identical twins are mixed up at birth by a short-sighted nurse, leading to their being raised in very different social circles. In later life, one pair, brought up in a poor mining town, visits New York to challenge a powerful conglomerate - only to find their respective siblings are in charge of the company. Comedy, starring Bette Midler and Lily Tomlin in dual roles alongside Fred Ward and Edward Herrmann.(n)

programme.title: The Jane Austen Book Club
programme.desc: Two women organise a book club devoted to reading and discussing Jane Austen novels. But the members - including a woman abandoned by her husband and a reluctant lovesick sci-fi fan - discover their own love lives are beginning to mirror the plots of her books in unexpected ways. Romantic comedy, starring Kathy Baker, Maria Bello, Emily Blunt, Amy Brenneman, Maggie Grace and Hugh Dancy.(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Elizabeth Bennet is one of five sisters whose mother is determined to find them suitable husbands. The arrival of a wealthy gentleman and his friends at a nearby mansion leads to an introduction between Elizabeth and the aloof Mr Darcy, to whom she takes an instant dislike. However, an unexpected attraction eventually develops. Period drama based on Jane Austen's novel, starring Keira Knightley, Matthew Macfadyen and Judi Dench.(n)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A repairman is assigned to salvage the remaining resources from Earth, which has been left a devastated wasteland after a war with an alien race. He discovers a human survivor on the surface of the planet, an encounter that exposes secrets from the past that threaten the future of the human race. Sci-fi adventure, starring Tom Cruise and Morgan Freeman.(n)

programme.title: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
programme.desc: A girl moves into a gothic mansion with her father and his new girlfriend, and hears strange noises coming from the basement. Her curiosity leads her to unwittingly unleash a swarm of voracious tiny monsters, but her attempts to warn her family of the terrible danger they are in fall on deaf ears. Horror, with Bailee Madison, Guy Pearce and Katie Holmes.(n)

programme.title: Ivan's Childhood
programme.desc: A Soviet youngster esacpes from a PoW camp after he is orphaned when German troops raze his village, and becomes determined to help the Red Army as a spy, with his tender years allowing him to come and go unsuspected. Andrei Tarkovsky's Second World drama, starring Kolya Burlyayev, Valentin Zubkov and Evgeniy Zharikov. In Russian.(n)

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: An ordinary teenager is recruited by a mystical martial arts master for a vitally important quest. He must find seven magical spheres before they fall into the hands of an evil warlord, who intends to use their power to let him take over the world. Fantasy adventure based on the Japanese cartoon series, starring Justin Chatwin, Chow Yun-Fat and James Marsters.(n)

programme.title: A Monster in Paris
programme.desc: A would-be inventor accidentally creates a monster which escapes onto the streets of Paris. As the scientist and his sidekick try to find their creation before the police do, the creature befriends a kindly cabaret singer, who discovers he has a gentle nature and a gift for music. Animated comedy, with the voices of Vanessa Paradis and Sean Lennon.(n)

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: A minor-league ice hockey player is nicknamed the Tooth Fairy for knocking opponents' teeth out on the ice. When the cynical athlete discourages a young fan, he is forced to pay penance by spending a week as the real Tooth Fairy, rediscovering his dreams in the process. Family comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Stephen Merchant, Ryan Sheckler and Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: A tough female pirate enlists the help of an educated slave in finding the three parts of a map leading to buried treasure. However, one of the pieces is in the hands of her cruel uncle, and she also has to find the loot before her crew mutinies or the British Navy catches up with her. Swashbuckling adventure, starring Geena Davis, Matthew Modine, Frank Langella and Maury Chaykin.(n)

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: The manager of an apartment complex asks a Wall Street financier to manage pension funds for him and his friends, but the man pockets all the money instead. When he realises the fraudster is going to get away with the crime and the money will never be found, he enlists the help of a professional thief to steal it back. Crime comedy, with Ben Stiller, Eddie Murphy, Alan Alda, Tea Leoni, Casey Affleck and Matthew Broderick.(n)

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: A man on a sailing holiday in Spain discovers his family have been abducted. His search for them leads him to learn that his father has been leading a double-life as a CIA agent, and has stolen top-secret information - which the kidnappers will stop at nothing to obtain. Thriller, starring Henry Cavill, Bruce Willis and Sigourney Weaver.(n)

programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares another selection of quick meals, including crispy Camembert parcels, an autumn salad with cranberry dip and a golden chicken with braised greens and potato gratin.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Dieters: How to Love Food and Lose Weight
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers continue their dietary challenge by reinventing favourite family meals. They prepare a cooked breakfast that delivers all the excitement of a fry-up without adding to the waistline, and a calorie-conscious roast chicken dinner. They also rework French classic the cassoulet and set it before a couple of famished rugby teams, and make the ultimate sacrifice in a bid to help shift the pounds - give up their beloved motorbikes in favour of bicycles.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond prepares food with herbs, including lemon-rosemary scones, French onion soup with fresh thyme, a panzanella salad with basil, and a minty raita with salted naan wedges.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond's bakes a caramel apple pie and a frozen grasshopper pie, as well as strawberry pretzel pie and mini blueberry galettes.(n)

programme.title: Korean Food Made Simple
programme.desc: Chef Judy Joo introduces some of the most traditional, classic Korean dishes of bibimpap, tofu and bossam. Back in her kitchen, she puts her own twist on these family classics.(n)

programme.title: Korean Food Made Simple
programme.desc: Executive chef Judy Joo introduces us to her family for birthday celebrations, lunchbox designing and Kimchi making - because good Korean food is all about family and sharing.(n)

programme.desc: The four remaining bakers take inspiration from typical Mother's Day gifts for their own desserts and chocolates.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Dieters: How to Love Food and Lose Weight
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers create low-calorie versions of their favourite party treats, including fairy cakes, quiche and chilli tacos, and Olly Smith offers advice on wines suitable for slimmers. programme.title: Home Shopping

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: The local mayor becomes embroiled in a sex scandal, so Boycie decides to stand for election as his replacement - unaware Llewellyn is planning to do the same. Marlene is put in a tight spot when a schoolfriend of Tyler's confesses he has developed feelings for her. John Challis and Sue Holderness star.(n)

programme.title: Butterflies
programme.desc: Ria is angered by a fox hunt and becomes determined to put a stop to it. Seventies romantic comedy, starring Wendy Craig.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy receives his great uncle's ashes, which are accompanied by some cryptic advice about affairs of the heart. Ronnie Corbett stars.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Lionel gets cold feet as the wedding approaches, while Jean tries to remain calm despite her sister-in-law's interference. Comedy, starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: The ever-optimistic Bob tries to broaden Terry's social circle by inviting him to a trendy dinner party, but as usual his well-meaning efforts result in disaster. Rodney Bewes and James Bolam star as the original men behaving badly.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Auntie Wainwright gives the boys a gas grill, but they have difficulty working out how the pressure valve works, bringing an explosive touch to their barbecue. Howard is busy making improvements on his love-nest, but whether it will ignite Marina's passions or just inflame her remains to be seen. Peter Sallis, Bill Owen, Brian Wilde and Robert Fyfe star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Compo and Foggy drink too much home brew at Ernie Mordue's funeral, resulting in bad hangovers for both of them. Bill Owen and Brian Wilde star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Have You Got a Light Mate?.
programme.desc: Howard asks Clegg to buy a china shepherdess from Auntie Wainwright's on his behalf, but she seems more interested in selling security lights. An unfortunate incident means that Foggy has to be rescued from the police. Peter Sallis and Brian Wilde star.(n)

programme.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Pet
programme.desc: The lads return to work on an ambitious engineering project, with new member Wyman filling in for his late, lamented dad Wayne. Reunited by Oz, who has secured the job of dismantling the world-famous Middlesbrough transporter bridge, they set about raising the necessary financial backing - but have a hard time persuading Dennis to join them. Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais' popular comedy drama, starring Jimmy Nail, Kevin Whately and Tim Healy.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Godber takes up boxing and enters the prison championships. He is hot favourite to win until Fletcher is given the task of fixing the contest and nobbling his cell-mate. Classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker, Richard Beckinsale and Peter Vaughan.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Lionel gets cold feet as the wedding approaches, while Jean tries to remain calm despite her sister-in-law's interference. Comedy, starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: The ever-optimistic Bob tries to broaden Terry's social circle by inviting him to a trendy dinner party, but as usual his well-meaning efforts result in disaster. Rodney Bewes and James Bolam star as the original men behaving badly.(n)
