programme.desc: The veteran naturalist examines the world of flight, travelling across the globe to chart the evolutionary story of those creatures who seemingly defy the rules of gravity by taking to the air. Initially focusing on insects, Attenborough meets a descendant of the dragonfly, before examining the Atlas beetle, which tends to restrict flight to times when it needs a mate or a fresh supply of food. More aesthetically pleasing is a group of beautiful tropical butterflies, followed by an in-depth study into the blow fly - the jet fighter of insects.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: While investigating a gang-related murder, Danny and Baez learn the accused shooter is an ex-con who is romantically linked to his parole officer.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Sun

programme.title: The Sopranos

programme.desc: Grissom investigates a murder outside a casino and arrests a dangerously unstable man who subsequently dies of liver failure while in custody. programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Grissom investigates a murder outside a casino and arrests a dangerously unstable man who subsequently dies of liver failure while in custody. However, Nick and Sara discover evidence that this was not the suspect's first murder and find a woman's skeleton buried at the motel where he worked. It transpires she was pregnant at the time of her disappearance eight years previously, so the team has to ascertain if the child is alive somewhere.(n)

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series focuses on Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong.(n)

programme.title: Son of the Pink Panther
programme.desc: Comedy sequel which sees Inspector Clouseau's over-enthusiastic son on the trail of a kidnapped princess, proving to be just as inept as his father every step of the way. Starring Roberto Benigni, Herbert Lom, Claudia Cardinale, Burt Kwouk, Debrah Farentino and Graham Stark.(n)

programme.title: Two Night Stand
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a recent break-up has a one-night stand with a stranger she met online. Hoping to leave quietly in the morning, she instead discovers a blizzard has left them both trapped in his apartment, forcing them to spend an awkward but enlightening day together. Romantic comedy, starring Analeigh Tipton and Miles Teller.(n)

programme.title: Top Secret
programme.desc: A rock 'n' roll singer goes on tour in East Germany in the 1950s, where a scientist's daughter draws him into the world of international espionage through a French underground movement seeking to foil a Nazi plan to take over the world. Comedy, spoofing Second World War spy thrillers and Elvis movies, starring Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge and Omar Sharif.(n)

programme.title: Awkward Sexy People
programme.desc: Two close friends who have always been unlucky in love resort to a drastic plan to turn their lives around. They decide to spend a summer indulging in as much hard drinking and casual sex as they can, in the hope that the experience will transform them into the confident people they have always longed to be. Romantic comedy, starring Adam Pally and Sarah Burns.(n)

programme.title: Police Academy 6: City Under Siege
programme.desc: The clueless cops return yet again, this time to thwart the machinations of a crime lord behind a wave of raids and robberies in the city. Unfortunately, they are unaware Mr Big is always one step ahead thanks to a police informer. Penultimate entry in the comedy series, starring Bubba Smith, David Graf, Michael Winslow, Matt McCoy and Leslie Easterbrook.(n)

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: A singer is transformed from naive country boy to the greatest rock 'n' roll legend of all time - with the traditional stand-bys of sex, drugs, failed marriages, falls from grace, spectacular comebacks and the love of a good woman along the way. Comedy spoof of music biopics, starring John C Reilly, Jenna Fischer and Raymond J Barry, and featuring appearances from Jack Black and Jack White.(n)

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A lazy twentysomething lives off his wealthy hotel magnate father. When the old man decides to retire, he begins to question whether his layabout son is suitable to take over the family empire and issues a challenge - he must retake 12 years of school in 24 weeks, or lose everything. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Bridgette Wilson, Darren McGavin and Bradley Whitford.(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage.(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Family man Rusty Griswold spent his childhood family holidays stumbling from one disaster to another with his hapless father. He is determined that his own road trip with his wife and kids will go better - but soon finds the apple has not fallen far from the tree. Sequel to the 1980s comedy series, starring Ed Helms and Christina Applegate, with Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo reprising their roles.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Teenager Marty McFly travels back to the 1950s in a time machine built by his eccentric inventor friend. The return journey proves tricky enough, but he also accidentally alters the sequence of events that led to his parents falling in love - and has to persuade his future dad to win his mother's heart, or he will never be born. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson and Crispin Glover.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly travels to the 21st century, where he has to save his children from a terrible fate. However, this proves to have unforeseen consequences when the future version of arch enemy Biff sees a chance to rewrite history for his own benefit, leaving Marty stuck in a twisted parallel universe. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly is transported back to the days of the Wild West, where he strives to save his eccentric scientist friend Doc Brown from death at the hands of a villainous gunslinger. Final instalment in the sci-fi comedy trilogy, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen and Thomas F Wilson.(n)

programme.title: The Overnight
programme.desc: A couple and their young son move to another city, and find themselves feeling adrift in a strange place. Things seem to change for the better when they meet another family and spend the evening at their new friends' house - but things quickly take a disturbing turn once the kids are in bed. Black comedy, starring Adam Scott, Taylor Schilling and Jason Schwartzman.(n)

programme.title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
programme.desc: A would-be rock star flees his repressive Christian father in search of stardom, teaming up with a laid-back guitarist along the way. However, for the duo to become the rock gods they are surely destined to be, they must find a magical guitar pick that gives its owner unprecedented musical prowess - a quest that leads them to a confrontation with Satan himself. Comedy, starring Jack Black, Kyle Gass, Meat Loaf, Dave Grohl, Tim Robbins, Ben Stiller and John C Reilly.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The world's most inept police detective, Inspector Clouseau, heads off to Switzerland in search of a suave jewel thief who has purloined a priceless diamond from a princess - but the bumbling officer's every ruse to foil the crime ends in chaos, not least when he is framed for the robbery himself. Blake Edwards' comedy, starring Peter Sellers, David Niven, Capucine, Robert Wagner and Claudia Cardinale.(n)

programme.title: The War of the Roses
programme.desc: Two students marry and go on to become a happy, affluent couple, but after several years, they decide to divorce. Neither of them is prepared to give up their luxurious house, turning their separation into a spiteful cycle of one-upmanship and humiliation. Black comedy, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Town
programme.desc: A bad-tempered dentist has a near-death experience and finds himself able to see ghosts. He is irritated to find that all the spirits need him to sort out their unresolved problems from when they were alive, particularly a man who wants the grouchy dentist to stop his widow from remarrying. Comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Greg Kinnear and Tea Leoni.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo.(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: A London man's misfortunes in love look set to change when he meets an American beauty. However, the prospect of a transatlantic relationship succeeding seems slim, so the pair go their separate ways - only for him to realise he is unable to get her out of his mind. Richard Curtis's comedy, with Hugh Grant, Andie MacDowell, John Hannah, Charlotte Coleman, Kristin Scott Thomas, Simon Callow and James Fleet.(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots
programme.desc: A pilot joins an elite squad to take part in a dangerous mission, but faces a struggle to live down his father's bad reputation - and win the love of a glamorous psychiatrist. Comedy spoofing action movies - principally Top Gun - starring Charlie Sheen, Lloyd Bridges, Valeria Golino, Cary Elwes, Kevin Dunn and William O'Leary.(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: A misunderstood soldier who has retired to a Buddhist monastery is drawn back into action for a special mission. A succession of failed rescue attempts has left countless American servicemen held hostage in the Middle East, and it falls to him to set them free. Spoof action movie sequel, starring Charlie Sheen, Valeria Golino, Lloyd Bridges and Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo.(n)

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc: A journalist leaves behind her sheltered life in New York to report from the front line in Afghanistan. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Tina Fey and Margot Robbie.(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright.(n)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: Clownfish Nemo becomes separated from his friends on the Great Barrier Reef - but the thrill of being able to swim freely and away from his overprotective father turns to horror when he is netted by a diver. His distraught dad sets out on a mission to find him, while the youngster finds himself in a dentist's tropical tank. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush.(n)

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan.(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright.(n)

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: A teenager with a promising academic future causes consternation for her family when she sets her sights on becoming a professional ice skater. Luckily, a former champion of the sport is on hand to offer training and advice. Comedy drama, starring Michelle Trachtenberg, Kim Cattrall, Joan Cusack and Hayden Panettiere, alongside a host of professional skaters.(n)

programme.title: Lava
programme.desc: James Ford Murphy's musical short following the love story of two ocean volcanoes, Uku and Lele, over millions of years. Animation, featuring the voices of Kuana Torres Kahele and Napua Makua.(n)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: Clownfish Nemo becomes separated from his friends on the Great Barrier Reef - but the thrill of being able to swim freely and away from his overprotective father turns to horror when he is netted by a diver. His distraught dad sets out on a mission to find him, while the youngster finds himself in a dentist's tropical tank. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush.(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: In Search of the Castaways
programme.desc: The two children of a missing sea captain receive a message in a bottle that convinces them their father is still alive. Enlisting an eccentric French professor to help them find him, they embark on round-the-world journey and face natural disasters and mutineers during the voyage. Children's adventure based on a novel by Jules Verne, starring Maurice Chevalier, Hayley Mills and George Sanders.(n)

programme.title: The Cat from Outer Space
programme.desc: A UFO crash-lands on Earth and its only occupant is an alien cat whose collar gives him strange powers, including the ability to communicate telepathically with humans. This turns out to be a useful skill when he is forced to enlist help to get his spaceship back after the US government seizes it. Disney sci-fi comedy, with Roddy McDowall and Sandy Duncan.(n)

programme.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame II
programme.desc: Lovable hunchback Quasimodo strives to prevent a scheming sorcerer from stealing Notre Dame's famous bell - but he and his friends will have their work cut out if they are to thwart the malevolent magician's plans. Disney animated sequel, with the voices of Tom Hulce, Demi Moore, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Haley Joel Osment, Kevin Kline and Jason Alexander.(n)

programme.title: The Great Mouse Detective
programme.desc: The evil Professor Ratigan masterminds a cunning plan to become supreme ruler of all mousedom by kidnapping a clever toy-maker and forcing him to participate in his evil schemes - but super-sleuth Basil of Baker Street is soon on the case. Animated adventure, with the voices of Vincent Price, Barrie Ingham, Val Bettin and Alan Young.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: Sky Movies takes a special look at Pixar's animated prehistoric adventure.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)

programme.title: Pocahontas
programme.desc: A Native American princess falls in love with an English settler, but her father is distrustful of the Europeans - not without just cause, as a cruel governor is prepared to wage war to get his hands on the gold he believes they are hiding. Disney animated drama, with the voices of Irene Bedard, Mel Gibson and Christian Bale.(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
programme.desc: Two monsters work for an energy firm that employs scary creatures to sneak into children's bedrooms and convert their screams into power. However, when a little girl accidentally wanders into the pair's domain, they have to race against time to return her safely home before anyone finds out. Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Inside 11-year-old Riley's head lives a team of five that controls her emotions. Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith.(n)

programme.title: Brave
programme.desc: A princess defies her mother's plans to secure peace by marrying her off to the son of one of their allies. A witch provides the rebellious royal with a magic spell to change her fate, but the enchantment backfires disastrously when the queen is transformed into a bear. Pixar's animated fantasy, with the voices of Kelly Macdonald, Emma Thompson and Billy Connolly.(n)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Well-meaning ant Flik lands his colony in trouble when he accidentally disposes of an offering meant for a swarm of greedy grasshoppers - who promptly promise a horrible revenge. Faced with the imminent destruction of the anthill, he sets out to save the situation by enlisting the help of a few would-be heroes - an out-of-work troupe of bugs from a low-rent flea circus. Pixar animation, with the voices of Dave Foley, Kevin Spacey and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
programme.desc: Two monsters work for an energy firm that employs scary creatures to sneak into children's bedrooms and convert their screams into power. However, when a little girl accidentally wanders into the pair's domain, they have to race against time to return her safely home before anyone finds out. Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn.(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.(n)

programme.title: Brave
programme.desc: A princess defies her mother's plans to secure peace by marrying her off to the son of one of their allies. A witch provides the rebellious royal with a magic spell to change her fate, but the enchantment backfires disastrously when the queen is transformed into a bear. Pixar's animated fantasy, with the voices of Kelly Macdonald, Emma Thompson and Billy Connolly.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Inside 11-year-old Riley's head lives a team of five that controls her emotions. Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith.(n)

programme.title: McFarland, USA
programme.desc: A former American football coach takes a job at an underprivileged school with a mostly Hispanic student body, and finds he has a lot to learn about their lives. When he discovers many of his pupils have a talent for running, he forms an athletics team and leads them to glory. Fact-based drama, starring Kevin Costner and Ramiro Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: A computer genius hacks into the mainframe of the company he used to work for, hoping to find evidence against the executive who stole his ideas. However, the intelligent master program running the system transports him into an electronic world, where he is forced to battle gladiators in a series of deadly games. Disney sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner and David Warner.(n)

programme.title: I Am Wrath
programme.desc: A grieving widower is shocked when his wife's killers manage to evade justice, so he seeks the aid of an old friend in taking the law into his own hands. However, as he hunts down the murderers, he discovers they have friends in very high places. Crime thriller, starring John Travolta and Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: World heavyweight boxing champion Rocky Balboa settles down into a life of luxury - but a cloud appears on the horizon in the shape of ambitious contender Clubber Lang, whose brutal fighting style represents a serious threat to his title. Drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Mr T, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers and Hulk Hogan.(n)

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg.(n)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: The dying wife of a retired assassin leaves him a puppy, in the hope that having something to love will stop him returning to a life of violence when she is gone. When the son of a Russian gangster steals his car and kills the dog, the hitman is provoked into a murderous rage and slaughters his way through the underworld in search of revenge. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves and Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the ill-fated 1970 Apollo 13 mission to the moon. Crew leader Jim Lovell is faced with a nightmare when the mission suffers an on-board explosion - leaving the team stranded in space with a dwindling oxygen supply while flight controllers and engineers in Houston try to find a way to bring the crew safely back to Earth. With Tom Hanks, Kevin Bacon, Bill Paxton, Ed Harris and Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: A clumsy teenager develops superhuman powers after a genetically engineered spider bites him. At first his fantastic skills delight him, but his elation is severely tempered by a family tragedy, prompting him to dedicate his talents to combating evil. However, he faces a baptism of fire in the form of crazed villain the Green Goblin. Comic-book superhero adventure, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco and Rosemary Harris.(n)

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: A ruthless warlord resolves to rid the desert of its few remaining tribes, prompting them to seek the help of a legendary assassin to end the despot's reign of terror by destroying his source of power - a beautiful but deadly sorceress. Fantasy action adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Steven Brand, Kelly Hu and Michael Clarke Duncan.(n)

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg.(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook double-crosses his partners in crime, a betrayal that leaves their friend and mentor dead. One year later, they regroup and come up with a daring plan to exact revenge on the traitor and reclaim their ill-gotten gains. Crime thriller inspired by the 1969 movie, starring Mark Wahlberg, Charlize Theron, Edward Norton, Seth Green and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: The dying wife of a retired assassin leaves him a puppy, in the hope that having something to love will stop him returning to a life of violence when she is gone. When the son of a Russian gangster steals his car and kills the dog, the hitman is provoked into a murderous rage and slaughters his way through the underworld in search of revenge. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves and Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: World heavyweight boxing champion Rocky Balboa settles down into a life of luxury - but a cloud appears on the horizon in the shape of ambitious contender Clubber Lang, whose brutal fighting style represents a serious threat to his title. Drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Mr T, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers and Hulk Hogan.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox.(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravenna's wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: Secret agent Black Widow is forced into an uneasy alliance with vigilante the Punisher on a vital mission. A notorious terrorist organisation has stolen dangerous top-secret technology, and it falls to the mismatched pair to stop them selling it to the highest bidder. Animated comic-book adventure, with the voices of Jennifer Carpenter and Brian Bloom.(n)

programme.title: Spy - Extended Version
programme.desc: A deskbound CIA agent provides valuable background support for a dashing secret agent, but has never gone into action herself. Everything changes, when the spy mysteriously vanishes, and she leaps into action to take his place, infiltrating the inner circle of a ruthless arms dealer and trying to avert a global catastrophe. Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Retired soldier Benjamin Martin, who turned his back on the military to become a farmer in South Carolina, takes up arms once more to avenge the unprovoked murder of his son at the hands of the British during the American War of Independence. As he seeks vengeance, he finds himself up against a sadistic officer wreaking havoc in the surrounding area. Roland Emmerich's action adventure, starring Mel Gibson, Jason Isaacs, Heath Ledger and Joely Richardson.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox.(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravenna's wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: Spy - Extended Version
programme.desc: A deskbound CIA agent provides valuable background support for a dashing secret agent, but has never gone into action herself. Everything changes, when the spy mysteriously vanishes, and she leaps into action to take his place, infiltrating the inner circle of a ruthless arms dealer and trying to avert a global catastrophe. Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.(n)

programme.title: Freezer
programme.desc: Wisecracking ex-con Robert is kidnapped and held hostage in a walk-in freezer by Russian thugs, who are convinced he has $8million from them. As he struggles to fight back against the cold, he soon discovers he is not alone. Thriller, starring Dylan McDermott.(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: A narcotics cop learns a small-time crook has been released from prison and goes behind the chief of police's back to organise a disproportionate manhunt for him. As his methods grow increasingly brutal, he comes closer to learning a secret from his own past. Detective drama, starring David Morse and Cory Monteith, in his final film role.(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: A federal agent investigating the bombing of a ferryboat in New Orleans is given access by the government to a top-secret device that allows him to see into the past. He focuses on one victim in particular, a woman whom he believes holds the key to the crime, and becomes convinced that he can prevent the explosion ever happening. Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel.(n)

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: A federal agent investigating the bombing of a ferryboat in New Orleans is given access by the government to a top-secret device that allows him to see into the past. He focuses on one victim in particular, a woman whom he believes holds the key to the crime, and becomes convinced that he can prevent the explosion ever happening. Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel.(n)

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier II
programme.desc: Haunted by the loss of his best friends in the Essex Range Rover murders, gangster Carlton Leach considers leaving his violent lifestyle behind him. Crime thriller, starring Ricci Harnett, Luke Mably and Steven Berkoff.(n)

programme.title: Deadly Sisters
programme.desc: Two sisters tire of their mother's alcoholism and a string of her abusive boyfriends, and plot to kill her. Thriller, starring Abigail Breslin, Georgie Henley and Mira Sorvino.(n)

programme.title: Mercury Plains
programme.desc: A troubled teenager runs away from home and crosses the border into Mexico. He is recruited by a mysterious paramilitary organisation, that battles against drug cartels, supposedly in the pursuit of law and order, while actually stealing from the criminals. As the group's actions grow more violent, he searches for a way to escape with his life. Action adventure, starring Scott Eastwood, Angela Sarafyan and Andy Garcia.(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: An imprisoned art thief and forger learns that his son is dying, and applies for early release. While his request is granted, he learns that the shady characters who granted his freedom want him to assist them in a daring heist, leaving him torn between carrying out the robbery and making his son's last wishes come true. Crime thriller, starring John Travolta and Christopher Plummer.(n)

programme.title: Kidnapping Freddy Heineken
programme.desc: Five men struggling to make ends meet decide to kidnap a beer tycoon who is one of Europe's richest men. The plan is a success, and they demand the biggest ransom in history - but tensions within the group threaten their chances of escaping the law. Fact-based crime drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Jim Sturgess and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: A man travelling through Chile in the 1970s is abducted by the secret police during the military coup that brought Pinochet to power. His girlfriend tries to find out what has happened to him, but to uncover the truth, she must join a cult posing as a charitable organisation, from which no one has ever escaped. Drama, starring Emma Watson and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: The Maid's Room
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant hired as a live-in maid at a luxurious summer house in Long Island witnesses something she shouldn't. Thriller, starring Paula Garces, Annabella Sciorra and Bill Camp.(n)

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: Sandra, a former pop star who put her career on hold to have a baby, suspects her producer-husband is now having an affair with a younger rising starlet. Determined to catch him out, she decides to surprise him by driving to Los Angeles with her young son in her new Monolith, a `super-car' with advanced security features. However, a series of unfortunate events leaves Sandra locked out of the car in the middle of the desert, while her son is trapped inside, and in mortal peril. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden.(n)

programme.title: Exposed
programme.desc: A detective is determined to bring his dead partner's killers to justice, despite warnings from both his superior officers and the murdered man's wife to forget about it. As he delves deeper, he uncovers dangerous secrets and evidence of political corruption, with a devoutly religious woman seemingly the key to the mystery. Crime thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Ana de Armas and Mira Sorvino.(n)

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: A man travelling through Chile in the 1970s is abducted by the secret police during the military coup that brought Pinochet to power. His girlfriend tries to find out what has happened to him, but to uncover the truth, she must join a cult posing as a charitable organisation, from which no one has ever escaped. Drama, starring Emma Watson and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: Sandra, a former pop star who put her career on hold to have a baby, suspects her producer-husband is now having an affair with a younger rising starlet. Determined to catch him out, she decides to surprise him by driving to Los Angeles with her young son in her new Monolith, a `super-car' with advanced security features. However, a series of unfortunate events leaves Sandra locked out of the car in the middle of the desert, while her son is trapped inside, and in mortal peril. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden.(n)

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro.(n)

programme.title: GI Blues
programme.desc: A guitar-strumming soldier bets he can win the hardened heart of an unresponsive West German cabaret dancer. She rejects him when she learns about the wager, but by then he has already genuinely fallen in love with her. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Juliet Prowse, James Douglas and Robert Ivers. Songs include Blue Suede Shoes, Tonight Is So Right For Love and the title number.(n)

programme.title: Fiddler on the Roof
programme.desc: A poor Jewish milkman is set on finding good husbands for his three eldest daughters while coming to terms with the pressures of village life in Ukraine under Tsarist rule. Unfortunately, his well-meaning plan is hampered by the girls' obstinate insistence on making their own marital choices. Norman Jewison's musical, starring Topol, Norma Crane, Paul Michael Glaser and Leonard Frey.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
programme.desc: An impoverished family is taken in by a relative - and while sensible elder daughter Elinor's love for the sensitive Edward Ferrars meets with disapproval from his family, her more passionate younger sister Marianne engages in a disastrous romance with an infamous womaniser. Period drama based on Jane Austen's novel, directed by Ang Lee and starring Emma Thompson, Kate Winslet, Alan Rickman and Hugh Grant.(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall.(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: A writer still recovering from the death of his wife struggles to retain custody of his daughter as he develops a serious illness. Years later, his daughter is now an adult and faces up to the personal issues brought about by her chaotic childhood as she begins a new relationship. Drama, starring Russell Crowe and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: An aristocratic Englishwoman inherits a vast cattle station in the Australian Outback in the 1930s. When her land comes under threat from a rival farmer aiming to build a monopoly, she is forced to lead her herd across the wilderness to secure the farm's future, falling for a tough stock-man and forming a friendship with a half-Aboriginal boy along the way. However, as they make their journey, the country becomes drawn into the Second World War. Baz Luhrmann's romantic drama, starring Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman.(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall.(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: Biopic of influential country singer Hank Williams, exploring his tempestuous marriage and addiction to alcohol and painkillers. With Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen.(n)

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A rodeo rider and a college student fall in love, but begin to question whether they have a future together as their dreams lead them in different directions. They form an unexpected friendship with an old man, whose decades-long tale of love provides them with fresh inspiration. Romantic drama based on the novel by Nicholas Sparks, starring Britt Robertson, Scott Eastwood and Alan Alda.(n)

programme.title: Before Sunrise
programme.desc: American tourist Jesse and French student Celine meet by chance on a train travelling to Vienna. The two strangers form a close connection almost instantly, and spend the day together in the city, discussing their hopes and dreams. However, their romance seems likely to only last a day, as Jesse is due to fly back home. Richard Linklater's romantic drama, starring Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy.(n)

programme.title: How to Marry a Millionaire
programme.desc: Three women rent a luxurious New York apartment as part of a scheme to get their claws into wealthy husbands - but their plans become unstuck when all three start to fall for men with good hearts and empty pockets. Comedy, starring Betty Grable, Marilyn Monroe, Lauren Bacall, William Powell, Cameron Mitchell, David Wayne, Rory Calhoun and Fred Clark.(n)

programme.title: A Promise
programme.desc: A German university graduate becomes the private secretary of a steel magnate in 1912, and an unspoken love develops between him and his employer's younger wife. He is sent overseas on business, but pledges to return in two years - however, the outbreak of the First World War drives them further apart. Romantic period drama based on Stefan Zweig's novel Journey Into the Past, with Rebecca Hall, Richard Madden and Alan Rickman.(n)

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: A headstrong Victorian woman inherits a sheep farm in a remote area of Dorset. She struggles to maintain her independence while being courted by three very different men - a stoic farmer, a dashing, reckless soldier and a lonely older man. Period drama based on Thomas Hardy's novel, starring Carey Mulligan, Matthias Schoenaerts, Tom Sturridge and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: A 14-year-old boy living in 1970s London has his life changed forever when his is introduced to The Clash by his estranged mother. Drama, starring Tom Hughes, Jonathan Rhys Meyers and Dougray Scott.(n)

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: A washed-up pop idol is given the chance to write a song for a teenage star - but despite his musical talents, he has never written a lyric in his life. However, the discovery that the woman who looks after his plants has a way with words marks the start of a beautiful relationship. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Drew Barrymore, Brad Garret and Kristen Johnston.(n)

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
programme.desc: A determined salesman takes custody of his five-year-old son when his wife leaves him, and secures an unpaid internship with a renowned stockbroking firm. However, the lack of a steady income begins to take its toll on the pair, leading to eviction from their home and a daily struggle to support themselves. Gabriele Muccino's fact-based drama, starring Will Smith alongside his son Jaden. With Thandie Newton, Brian Howe, James Karen, Dan Castellaneta and Kurt Fuller.(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: A doctor discovers a dead American football player died as the result of brain trauma inflicted on the field. He tries to raise awareness of the danger and provide greater protection from injury for players, but finds himself up against a powerful institution determined to bury the risk. Fact-based drama, starring Will Smith, Alec Baldwin and Albert Brooks.(n)

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: A woman survives a strange accident that means she never ages. She lives to be over 100, but resists getting close to people for fear of her secret being discovered. She finally falls in love with a man and considers trying to have a relationship with him, only to realise she has a shared history with his father. Romantic fantasy, starring Blake Lively, Michiel Huisman and Harrison Ford.(n)

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: A ruthless millionaire hires a prostitute while on a business trip. Realising she may be useful in helping him keep up a successful appearance, he pays her to accompany him for a week as he associates with the rich and powerful - but falls in love despite their many differences. Romantic comedy, starring Richard Gere and Julia Roberts, with Ralph Bellamy and Laura San Giacomo.(n)

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: An inventive chef's unconventional methods make him the toast of Paris, but his career is derailed by an alcohol and drugs-fuelled meltdown. An old friend offers him a second chance by hiring him to take over the kitchens of an exclusive London restaurant, but has a hard time keeping his acerbic nature in check. Drama, starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Daniel Bruhl, Emma Thompson and Uma Thurman.(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: An all-American family adopts a huge St Bernard, but the father is dismayed when it turns into a one-dog disaster zone. He insists the mutt must go to a new home, but when it is kidnapped by a crooked vet, dad has a change of heart and races to the rescue. Comedy, starring Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Oliver Platt and David Duchovny.(n)

programme.title: Animal Kingdom: Let's Go Ape
programme.desc: A primate king's outcast son eventually comes into his own, learning how to run on two legs and the secrets of fire. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ben Bishop, Anjella Mackintosh and Geoff Searle.(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: The singing rodents mistakenly come to the conclusion that their human friend Dave intends to get rid of them when he proposes to his girlfriend in Miami. With only three days until Dave pops the question, the trio embark on a desperate road trip across America to sabotage his romantic plans. Family comedy sequel, starring Jason Lee and Kimberly Williams-Paisley.(n)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: A rat finds his love of fine food has made him an outcast to his less discerning family. Separated from his fellow rodents by a storm, he winds up in a famous French restaurant, where he helps an incompetent kitchen assistant become the greatest chef in Paris. Pixar animated comedy from the director of The Incredibles, with the voices of Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano and Peter O'Toole.(n)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: A lion prince blames himself for his father's death and flees into the wilderness, leaving his wicked uncle to take over. As the cub grows to adulthood, he receives a vision of the dead king, who inspires him to seek revenge and reclaim his rightful throne. Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: Animal Kingdom: Let's Go Ape
programme.desc: A primate king's outcast son eventually comes into his own, learning how to run on two legs and the secrets of fire. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ben Bishop, Anjella Mackintosh and Geoff Searle.(n)

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr.(n)

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: Gonzo hits the road with pal Rizzo in tow and goes in search of his roots - only to make the amazing discovery that his parents belonged to a race of aliens. He then has to choose whether to board a UFO and return to his family, or stay with the friends he knows and loves. Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets.(n)

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: A huge robot falls from outer space and crash-lands in a small American town, terrifying the locals with its fearsome appearance. The kindly giant is befriended by a lonely youngster - but trouble looms on the horizon when a corrupt government agent sets his sights on destroying the visitor. Family animated adventure based on the children's story by poet Ted Hughes. With the voices of Vin Diesel, Eli Marienthal, Jennifer Aniston and Harry Connick Jr.(n)

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr.(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book: Special
programme.desc: The making of Jon Favreau's reimagining of the Disney classic, featuring the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Scarlett Johanssen.(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tale of Two Kitties
programme.desc: The lazy moggy stows away in his owner's luggage and ends up in London. He is promptly mistaken for an English upper-class cat, who has recently inherited a grand estate, and moves into his stately home - much to the dismay of the real aristocratic feline's conniving relation, who is bent on swindling him out of his money. Family comedy, starring Breckin Meyer, Billy Connolly and Jennifer Love Hewitt, with the voices of Bill Murray and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.(n)

programme.title: Treasure Buddies
programme.desc: Five golden retriever puppies embark on a danger-filled quest halfway across the world as they search for the greatest treasure known to animalkind. Arriving in Egypt, the canine explorers make some new exotic friends and search through ancient ruins as they try to stop devious sphynx cat Ubasti from claiming their prize. Family adventure sequel, with the voices of Skyler Gisondo and Elaine Hendrix.(n)

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee.(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: Date and Switch
programme.desc: Two guys make a pact to lose their virginity before their senior prom, but things take an unexpected turn when one of them comes out of the closet. Comedy, starring Nicholas Braun, Hunter Cope and Dakota Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Winter
programme.desc: A father consumed by grief must come to terms with an emotional breakdown in order to save his relationship with his two young sons. Drama, starring Tommy Flanagan, Edward Ashley and David Broughton-Davies.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley.(n)

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria.(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Five friends on their way to a concert find a seven-year-old girl lost and alone in a car park. They decide to take her back to her parents' house, unaware that an evil spirit is waiting for them there and that they have been lured into a deadly trap. Horror, starring Jeremy Sumpter and Elizabeth Di Prinzio.(n)

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan.(n)

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber.(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster.(n)

programme.title: Attack Of The Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: Trapped snowboarders fight for their lives when hordes of the undead terrorise a remote ski resort. Horror-comedy, starring Laurie Calvert, Gabriela Marcinkova and Oscar Dyekjaer Giese.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: Titan AE
programme.desc: In the year 3038, an alien race has annihilated almost all of mankind and destroyed the Earth. A scientist escapes the planet on board a craft that is destined to be humanity's only chance of future survival - the spaceship Titan. Fourteen years later, his estranged son plucks up courage and sets out on a perilous journey to find the ship and reunite with his father. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Matt Damon, Bill Pullman and Drew Barrymore.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: An elite military unit is flown to a top secret facility for a training exercise. The soldiers are intended to be put to the test in a battle simulation against robots, but when the machines start trying to really kill them, they discover a deadly threat to the human race. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vanessa Kirby and Thure Lindhardt.(n)

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: John Connor finds his destiny to lead the human race in a future war is catching up with him when an advanced new Terminator in female form is sent back in time to eliminate him. However, a reprogrammed cyborg has also been dispatched to act as his protector. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken.(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford hosts this installment from Las Vegas, featuring Earthquake, Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb and Donnell Rawlings(n)

programme.title: Sunshine
programme.desc: Ralph Fiennes plays three characters in Istvan Szabo's compelling epic, which chronicles three generations in a Hungarian-Jewish family. The story focuses on the Sonnenschein clan and the anti-Semitism they face---especially when Hitler comes to power. Rosemary Harris, Rachel Weisz, Jennifer Ehle, Molly Parker, Deborah Kara Unger(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: A young woman tries to find her biological mom in this star-studded ensemble comedy about Mother's Day. Elsewhere, a divorced mother of two falls for a guy with two kids of his own, and an overstressed mom is visited by her bickering parents(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: With support from the Florida International University's Cuban Research Institute, Lisandro Perez-Rey directs Mas Alla Del Mar (Beyond the Sea), a documentary about the Mariel Boatlift. This historical and personal film tells the story of several Cuban exiles who left their island country from the port of Mariel during the boatlift of 1980. Following a rush on the embassy in Havana, more than 100,000 Cubans fled their homeland in hopes of creating a new life in the U.S. A mass of Cuban residents -- from average middle-class families to hardened criminals -- huddled onto boats. Upon their arrival in Florida, many of them were met with violence. Perez-Ray visits with many of the surviving exiles for in-depth interviews(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, directed, produced and costars in this gripping drama about a scandal that rocks two families with a lengthy history. One of them is upper-class, the other working class, and each is led by a strong-willed matriarch who are long-time friends. Kathy Bates and Alfre Woodard are outstanding as the two women trying to keep their respective families from ruining countless lives. The superb ensemble cast also features Sanaa Lathan, Cole Hauser, Rockmond Dunbar and Kadee Strickland(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Biopic of 1960s boxer Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, who was unjustly imprisoned for murder and served more than two decades before winning his freedom(n)

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: An examination of the 2003 murder of Baylor University basketball player Patrick Dennehy by his friend Carlton Dotson, and the ensuing accusations aimed at the university and coach Dave Bliss(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: Julia Roberts leads an all-star cast in this riotous rom-com. Despite breaking up messily and publicly, two movie stars need to get back together in order to promote a film(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, directed, produced and costars in this gripping drama about a scandal that rocks two families with a lengthy history. One of them is upper-class, the other working class, and each is led by a strong-willed matriarch who are long-time friends. Kathy Bates and Alfre Woodard are outstanding as the two women trying to keep their respective families from ruining countless lives. The superb ensemble cast also features Sanaa Lathan, Cole Hauser, Rockmond Dunbar and Kadee Strickland(n)

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: An examination of how young men are radicalized in the U.S. to commit terrorists acts and what can be done to prevent it(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Port Authority cop Doug Carlin travels back in time to save the key witness in the investigation into a ferry bombing. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: Ex-soldiers Michael Atwood (Chiwetel Ejiofor) and Russel Welch (Norman Reedus) lead an Atlanta criminal organization, which also includes Welch's troubled brother Gabe (Aaron Paul) and dirty cops Marcus Belmont (Anthony Mackie) and Jorge Rodriguez (Clifton Collins Jr.). The five heisters are contracted by the Russian-Israeli mob, headed by matriarch Irina Vlaslov (Kate Winslet), to pull off a dangerous job, and they decide to create the diversion of an "officer down" call as a cover for the robbery. Marcus' straight-arrow new partner Chris (Casey Affleck) is soon targeted as the mark for the shooting; meanwhile, Chris' uncle, Detective Jeffrey Allen (Woody Harrelson), works to foil the criminals. John Hillcoat directed this ensemble /action thriller written by Matt Cook(n)

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In this unconventional biopic, legendary jazz trumpeter Chet Baker (Ethan Hawke) must relearn his craft in the late '60s after his front teeth are knocked out during a mugging. As he strives to get his career back on track and overcome his heroin addiction, he receives support from his new girlfriend (Carmen Ejogo), an actress who was cast to play his lover in a movie about his life. Written and directed by Robert Budreau, Born to Be Blue made its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Requiem for a Dream
programme.desc: Darren Aronofsky ("Pi") wrote and directed this bleak but potent adaptation of Hubert Selby Jr.'s novel. It's the story of a Brooklyn man (Jared Leto), his mother (Ellen Burstyn), girlfriend and business partner and their descent into drug addiction. Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans, Louise Lasser(n)

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: Adventure tale about a rather clueless DIY detective with his own built-in tool kit whose grafted-on gizmos and gadgets make him a one-man army and more than a match for the evil Dr Claw(n)

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: A laid-back health inspector's comfortable routine receives an unwelcome shake up when he's assigned the task of training his new rookie partner and investigating the outbreak of a mysterious illness at one of the city's most posh restraints in this no-holds-barred comedy starring Blue Collar standup king Larry the Cable Guy. It's all greasy spoons and low-rent ethnic eateries in the world of seasoned big-city health inspector Larry (Larry the Cable Guy), and that's just the way he likes it. After begrudgingly accepting the task of training by-the-books trainee Amy (Iris Bahr), Larry lands the biggest case of his career when a group of high-class diners fall ill following a particularly pricey meal. Though the gruff but lovable health inspector soon loses his job as a direct result of his questionable manners, he soon wins the heart of a shy waitress while attempting to go undercover to crack the case and ensure that the conspirators who engineered the poisonous plan are brought to justice(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: Romantic drama in which a top female surfer training for a high-profile competition in Hawaii finds her preparation jeopardised when she falls for a hunky American football player staying in town(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush 2
programme.desc: Haunted by the memory of her deceased mother, Dana leaves Malibu behind and heads to South Africa to fulfill her mother's dream of surfing Jefferys Bay(n)

programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: Can late-night radio host Leon Phelps find his mystery sugar momma and avoid the wrath of an angry mob of husbands? Only one way to find out!(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: Ewan McGregor and Pierce Brosnan star in Roman Polanski's much lauded adaptation of author Robert Harris's political conspiracy thriller. When the corpse of the man ghost-writing the memoirs of former British Prime Minister Adam Lang is found, apparently having accidentally fallen from a ferry, another writer is quickly hired to finish the job. The new man is dispatched to the ex-PM's swish home in the States. As the writer begins his task, he's frustrated that he's not allowed completely free access to his predecessor's draft but gets on with the work, under pressure from all sides to finish the job quickly. But, later, he uncovers documents, seemingly left by the dead man, which throw a new light on everything: they suggest Lang and his wealthy friends have very dark secrets that they'd kill for. Will the new ghost-writer now suffer the same fate as the previous one? Also starring Olivia Williams, Tom Wilkinson and Kim Cattrall(n)

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Drama set in 1960s New York about an Italian American boy surrounded by conflicting influences while growing up in the Bronx. The boy's father is almost powerless to do anything when his son becomes increasingly corrupted by a neighbourhood gangster. The two father figures - one hard-working and loving, the other involved in dangerous, underworld activities - exert conflicting pressures and beliefs(n)

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: Rust Belt ex-con Russell is released from prison and must choose between escaping his life of poverty or saving his younger brother Rodney, who has fallen in with a dangerous crime ring(n)

programme.title: Homeland
programme.desc: America First. Season 6 ends as pieces fall into place(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: The Kingmaker. Axe faces opposition investigating Sandicot; Chuck digs up dirt on a rival(n)

programme.title: Dark Net
programme.desc: My Justice. An amateur sleuth seeks justice in the case of a young woman's mysterious death, only to discover that the accused killer is the real victim; a digital activist takes a stand for social justice and then finds himself forced to choose between prison and exile(n)

programme.title: Penn & Teller: Bull!
programme.desc: Teen Sex. The guys examine measures parents undertake in dealing with teenage sex(n)

programme.title: Gigolos
programme.desc: Really Smooth Operators. Steven meets up with his very first girlfriend; some of the guys try a new "manscaping" procedure; Brace takes care of a cancer patient's bucket-list request(n)

programme.title: Dark Net
programme.desc: My Justice. An amateur sleuth seeks justice in the case of a young woman's mysterious death, only to discover that the accused killer is the real victim; a digital activist takes a stand for social justice and then finds himself forced to choose between prison and exile(n)

programme.title: The Circus: Inside the Biggest Story on Earth
programme.desc: The Whole World Is Watching. A look at President Trump's military response to the use of chemical weapons in Syria and its impact on his ongoing delicate dance with Russia(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: The Kingmaker. Axe faces opposition investigating Sandicot; Chuck digs up dirt on a rival(n)

programme.title: Dark Net
programme.desc: My Mind. Season 2 begins with Harmony, the world's first artificially intelligent sex robot. Also: a woman who spends her days and nights uploading her mind to the algorithm; and a family whose lives were torn apart by over a decade of war, only to be saved by virtual reality(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: Helpline operator Tank spends his spare time getting paid by guys to take their ex girlfriends out on awful dates in the hope that it will make them realise how good their ex was in comparison. However, complications arise when a close pal requires his services and the date goes too well, as Tank finds himself falling for his best friend's girl(n)

programme.desc: With support from the Florida International University's Cuban Research Institute, Lisandro Perez-Rey directs Mas Alla Del Mar (Beyond the Sea), a documentary about the Mariel Boatlift. This historical and personal film tells the story of several Cuban exiles who left their island country from the port of Mariel during the boatlift of 1980. Following a rush on the embassy in Havana, more than 100,000 Cubans fled their homeland in hopes of creating a new life in the U.S. A mass of Cuban residents -- from average middle-class families to hardened criminals -- huddled onto boats. Upon their arrival in Florida, many of them were met with violence. Perez-Ray visits with many of the surviving exiles for in-depth interviews(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, directed, produced and costars in this gripping drama about a scandal that rocks two families with a lengthy history. One of them is upper-class, the other working class, and each is led by a strong-willed matriarch who are long-time friends. Kathy Bates and Alfre Woodard are outstanding as the two women trying to keep their respective families from ruining countless lives. The superb ensemble cast also features Sanaa Lathan, Cole Hauser, Rockmond Dunbar and Kadee Strickland(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Biopic of 1960s boxer Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, who was unjustly imprisoned for murder and served more than two decades before winning his freedom(n)

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: An examination of the 2003 murder of Baylor University basketball player Patrick Dennehy by his friend Carlton Dotson, and the ensuing accusations aimed at the university and coach Dave Bliss(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: Julia Roberts leads an all-star cast in this riotous rom-com. Despite breaking up messily and publicly, two movie stars need to get back together in order to promote a film(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, directed, produced and costars in this gripping drama about a scandal that rocks two families with a lengthy history. One of them is upper-class, the other working class, and each is led by a strong-willed matriarch who are long-time friends. Kathy Bates and Alfre Woodard are outstanding as the two women trying to keep their respective families from ruining countless lives.
